ðŸ“– Summary: Preswald is a framework that enables developers to build interactive data applications from Python scripts without writing frontend code. It offers pre-built UI components, stateful execution, and a DAG-based execution model. Preswald allows for one-command deployment, enabling easy sharing and hosting of applications locally or in the cloud.
